name: Environmental Protection Act v.3.3
description: DO NOT DELETE / REVISE This law is dependent on the Road Districts to be clearly defined before it takes affect.The purpose of this law is to safeguard the Giant Panda environment from the affects of pollution, overharvesting of plants and animals, global warming  as well as prevent a potential sea/lake water level to raise and flooding claims

properties.Title: Section 1 : The Right to Hunt
properties.UserDescription: Allows to hunt on claimed lands, regardless of Authorization.

properties.UserDescription: This section prevents the extinction of any plant/animal species from overharvesting

properties.Title: Section 4 Forestry Maintenance Exemption
properties.UserDescription: This section allows Citizens to remove impeding branches next to claim areas/zones

properties.Title: Section 5 : Global Warming Safeguards
properties.UserDescription: This section halts all air pollution activities if total CO2 exceeds 350 PPM.

Left.contextDescription: Amount of carbon dioxide released into the atmosphere this interval (30 seconds) in Parts Per Million.

properties.Title: Section 6 : Anti Littering Law
properties.UserDescription: This law prevents indistriciminate dumping of potential pollutants that causes ground pollution,
